name: Taxi Driver - Cyberpunk 2077
description:
Hello! This is just a prototype base idea about a simple taxi game. It's our first experience in Unreal Engine and 3D games, so, overlook.

The incredible features of this GOTY:
  • Incredible night cycle, it's night everytime!
  • A giant diversity of TWO CARS.
  • Taxi and NPCs cars inspired by Luigi Colani prototypes.
  • Only a single person in the street (looks like the original Cyberpunk 2077 game, no NPCs on the street).
  • An AI system of cars driving around the city (accidents happen sometimes).
  • The game is so well polished that it shines (you need a RTX3090 to run at stable 60fps).
  • Great soundtrack of White Bat Audio (the best part of the game).
